articles.title: Watch: An exclusive look at South Africa’s COVID-19 BCG vaccine trial - The South African
articles.description: The aim of the study is to determine if the BCG vaccine will reduce the probability of contracting the virus or lessen the severity of symptoms associated with COVID-19.
articles.content:
Cape Town-based clinical research organisation TASK has recently begun work on the practical application of a BCG (Bacillus CalmetteGuérin) vaccine trial and its potential ability to halt COVID-19.
Led by Professor Andreas Diacon and Dr Caryn Upton, the aim … [+4401 chars]

articles.author: PTI
articles.title: Hotter, humid weather may not halt spread of COVID-19: Study - The Indian Express
articles.description: The study found little or no association between latitude or temperature with epidemic growth of COVID-19, and a weak association between humidity and reduced transmission.
articles.content:
By: PTI | Toronto | 
Published: May 8, 2020 12:52:59 pm
